title: Mr.Hamad
description: I would like to get a help with creating an app, I am not looking to look for a job work, I hope you could understand

title: Need help with speed of website!
description: Hi, Thanks for applying! We have recently had our website redesigned (still in the final stages) but needing the website (at least for Chrome) to increase the speed and wanting to make sure my website is considered safe when visiting. Testing it out on google chrome and seeing this but only with Chrome. But once it finally loads, it shows secured. Please see attachments. Please let me know if you need any additional info. Thank you!

title: [NFT] Need of a Senior Full stack web3 developer to join the CTO
description: Hello, I am looking for a talented web3 developers who is really good in architecture and can provide advices to the team. Ongoing topics we need someone to help us : - Create a wallet where user can connect to other platform that has wallet connect - Experience with Arianee

title: firmware developer for IOT
description: Hello, I'm looking for an experienced firmware developer that can re-create firmware for one of the Chinese devices we have. I have protocol documentation. Looking for someone that can get this done within a couple of weeks. Pretty basic triggers.

title: Need help in PHP related assignment which consists of multiple hands on programs
description: Hi I need to get one of my sisters PHP assignment to be completed Its around 8 hands on questions which requires a PHP intermediate experience

title: Finish a WordPress project that has already been largely built
description: We are an online tutoring company and this is our website: https://sealtutors.co.uk/ Our website is a WordPress website and thus we are looking for a freelancer or agency that is well-experienced in e-learning WordPress platforms. We already have a written project plan which we need to be finished by a new developer. Please find attached the project plan. Red = Not completed at all Yellow = Mostly/partially Completed but needs to be finished Green = Completed What we are looking for: - Full completion of all the submodules listed on the project plan (including Tutor listing page, calendar installation for teacher schedule, forgot password etc.) - Informing us of the faults on the websites and their fixes - Ensuring the optimisation of our API usage - Ensuring that any small faults e.g. in the gravity forms and their structures are corrected - Removal of any bugs and completion of any fixes needed - Ensuring that the weblinks have been redirected to the correct places. (During the migration from our old site, some of the links on our new site still revert back to the old site instead of the new one. Therefore, all the links need to be correctly directed to the new site and not the old). - Any further improvements that need to be made to the website or design of the elements from the previous developer - A meeting every Friday to discuss what has been completed during the week - Ensuring that the website is fully ready for launch once the project is finished Scope of project: 6 - 9 weeks.

title: Update our Azure online software for V2 updates including Automatic email notifications and more
description: We already have a V1 build but we are still needing automatic updates and other V2 updates we have everything in a step by step process.

title: Having problem listing NFTs from Nano Ledger
description: I've tried several times transferring my NFTs from ledger to metamask or other wallets and for some reason I can't transfer them at all. I'm not a noob with these kinda stuff so it must be something obvious I'm missing

title: Website Top Modern
description: hi we need a top modern websites for our company group. TOP MODERN WEBSITES 1- Real estate brokerage 2- Real estate development 3- Real estate management 4- Interior design 5- Construction 6- Dental clinic 7- Group company 8- Personal website 9- News website 10- Online food delivery 11- Raffle Draw

title: Github / Next.JS / React.JS / Vercel / Tailwind CSS developer / Figma
description: Seeking a multi-talented developer who can take a Figma site design and build a Next.JS/React website, served on Vercel (code & branch versioning control on Github), with a headless blog from Ghost.com, based on Tailwind CSS. Skills required: Figma / Tailwind CSS / Next.JS / React / Vercel / Ghost.com / Github The last site we developed using the same tech stack was xperiencify (dotcom) Unfortunately the developer who did that site isn't available to continue working with us. You should have fluent English, be available in US business hours, be a great written communiciator and be able to work fast.
